title: How is this person not banned
body:
[-removed- but short description is player bought lots of BF swords, instead of traditional builds - Maraudaur]

They just got in champ select as support and demanded they would play top. I dodged and looked them up. I have never seen so many B.F swords in my life.

Now I have a 10-30min (if Im lucky) wait to get another game because queue times are fked.

replies.body:
Name and shaming is not ok, can you please remove the link.
I know it sicks but there is a reason for it.
If you still feel the need of "Punishment" send a support ticket (With that link and other proof)

I will say it again and again and again and again and keep saying this until everyone realises.

The TERMS AND CONDITIONS on the OCE site state in basic terms, YOU CANNOT BE BANNED nor can Riot REFUSE ANYTHING YOU WANT TO POST.

Look it up, it's quite hilarious that Riot are at the mercy of the Australian Government and let us do whatever we like, including playing like the guy OP posted. There are numerous accounts like this and not one of them are banned for any reason.

Here's the relevant section from the terms of use taken from http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse

> D. Forums.  If you have a valid and active Account, you may post communications and other content to the “forums” section of the Site (the “Forums”).  You agree to abide by the Code of Conduct, as well as the policy concerning Links (found below) while participating in the Forums.  You understand that much of the information included in the Forums is from other players who are not employed by or under the control of Riot Games.  You further acknowledge that a large volume of information is available in the Forums and that people participating in such Forums may occasionally post messages or make statements, whether intentionally or unintentionally, that are inaccurate, misleading, deceptive, abusive or even unlawful. Riot Games neither endorses nor is responsible for such messages or statements, or for any opinion, advice, information or other utterance made or displayed in the Forums by you or the other users.  The opinions expressed in the Forums reflect solely the opinions of you and/or the other users and may not reflect the opinions of Riot Games.  Riot Games is not responsible for any errors or omissions in postings, for hyperlinks embedded in messages or for any results obtained from the use of the information contained in the Forums.  Under no circumstances will Riot Games be liable for any loss or damage caused by your reliance on the information in the Forums or your use of the Forums.  You should be aware that, when you disclose information about yourself in a Forum, the information is being made publicly available and may be collected and used by other users.  When you disclose any information in a Forum, you do so at your own risk.  **_Riot Games reserves the right to, but has no obligation to, monitor the Forums, or any postings or other materials that you or other players transmit or post on the Forums, or remove any such materials, and to disclose such materials and the circumstances surrounding their transmission to any third party in order to operate the Site properly or to comply with legal obligations or governmental requests._**

It's even funnier when you read it again.

_**or to comply with legal obligations or governmental requests.**_

The whole T+C's on the OCE site just say "FUCK IT, WERE DONE!" and Rito don't have to give 2 shits about the OCE community or server.

On that note, I think I am done. Low level ranked is up shit creek without a paddle and Rito don't have to give 2 shits, so why should we?
It's funny how many times everyone names and shames and people tell them not to but it still continues to happen

The whole naming and shaming shit, there is nothing stating we can't do that. I can't even remember the last time I seen a red, if ever on OCE (maybe previously on NA) stating we can't name and shame, only greens who think they are gods given children.

Nah.

A basic tenant of any justice system (worth the name) is that justice must be _seen_ to be done. Without this there is no deterrent to others and there is no sense of justice for those wronged. This transparency does not happen within the LoL system. Its just a game....This fker ruined my game, wasted my time and the time of 8 other people....and if you look at their history wasted the time of countless others. It probably adds up to weeks of other peoples lives wasted. 

Submitting a ticket into the void is not good enough. They may get banned...who would know?

fk them.

edit....And take another look at this child's history. There are two options here. Either they are getting reported and Riot's not doing anything about it, or somehow troll behavior on an epic scale is not coming to their attention. Either way the system is broken.

Hey,

Just from looking at the history. It looks like this player might just be bad/new/trying to figure out the game on their own. While it may look similar to intentional feeding due to the duplicate item builds (lots of BF swords), it looks like this player is actually trying. Note they almost always participate in the game with 38% kill participation and 5/8.6/5.8 KDA over the last 20 games.

Except he trolled in champ select. Got in as support then repeatedly stated he was top over the objections of the person who was actually top....and laughed at our objections.

His picking of BF sword has occurred over far more games than the last 20 and if you go far enough back you find games in which he built more conventionally. 

In short, while he does not seem to be intentionally feeding he is obviously trolling.

Apologies I didn't intend for it to come across as he only did it once. He's definitely been doing it a lot and what I meant was from the match history itself it just looks like they are a bad player. This was a observation based on match history only. I don't know what he said in chat.

But if he was negative or went against the role selection, definitely report him after the game. If they consistently are negative or go against assigned roles AND they are reported then they will be banned. But I don't think choosing to build a certain way is enough to get reported. (i.e. we don't ban players that are bad/new/trying new things)

Why would this Summoner even be banned?

The Summoner is playing their own meta, it's about time someone did that, if anything this Summoner should get a free hextech key or chest.
So next time I'm in game I'm not allowed to buy more then 1 of the same item over and over again for all my games?

> [{quoted}](name=Kobayashi Maru,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=EA3iXHuo,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-28T04:15:49.369+0000)
>
> [-removed- but short description is player bought lots of BF swords, instead of traditional builds - Maraudaur]

That is not a short description of this players behavior. How about 'got multiple BF (3-4 per game) over dozens and dozens of games and ignored role (had support demanded top) and trolled all team mates in champ select while laughing at their attempts to reason with them. Not so pithy but it contains more than a grain of truth.

This BS short description makes out that hes only done this once and he didn't steal someones role.
